humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates a diagnosis of invasive ductal carcinoma with a tumor size of 3 cm and 2 cm, and a pathologic classification of pT2(mult)N1aL1VOM1RO. The 'N1a' in the classification indicates that there are metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes, which corresponds to N1 based on New Rule 12.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pT2(mult)N1aL1VOM1RO' tumor classification in the report indicates that the tumor has invaded the breast tissue to a significant extent (pT2) and has multiple tumor foci (mult). The 'N1a' portion of the classification indicates that cancer has spread to 1-3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.
